sentences.en: a packet of sunflower seeds
sentences.cn: 一包葵花籽

sentences.en: According to the Bible we are all the seed of Adam.
sentences.cn: 根据《圣经》所说的,我们都是亚当的后裔.

sentences.en: He began by scattering seed and putting in plants.
sentences.cn: 他从播种和栽苗开始。

sentences.en: He says the economy has gone to seed.
sentences.cn: 他说经济已经走向衰退。

sentences.en: He’s been top seed for the past two years.
sentences.cn: 他在过去两年中一直是头号种子选手。

sentences.en: I learned how to weigh out packages of seed.
sentences.cn: 我学会了如何称出袋装种子的重量。

sentences.en: I sow the seed in pots of soil-based compost.
sentences.cn: 我把种子种在一盆盆施有堆肥的土里。

sentences.en: If unused, winter radishes run to seed in spring.
sentences.cn: 如果不去动的话，冬萝卜会在春天开花结籽。

sentences.en: In the final Capriati, the third seed, defeated Katerina Maleeva.
sentences.cn: 在决赛中，三号种子选手卡普里亚蒂击败了凯特林娜·马莉娃。

sentences.en: Rake the soil, press the seed into it, then cover it lightly.
sentences.cn: 将土耙松，把种子种在土里，然后轻轻地盖上土。

sentences.en: Scatter the grass seed over the lawn.
sentences.cn: 把草籽撒到草坪上。

sentences.en: Small particles adhere to the seed.
sentences.cn: 小颗粒牢牢附着在种子上。

sentences.en: Some seed varieties germinate fast, so check every day or so.
sentences.cn: 有一些种子发芽快，所以差不多每天得察看一下。

sentences.en: Sow the seed in a warm place in February/March.
sentences.cn: 2月或3月里把种子播种在温暖的地方。

sentences.en: The globular seed capsule contains numerous small seeds.
sentences.cn: 这种球形种子荚里含有大量的小种子。

sentences.en: The old neighborhood has gone to seed.
sentences.cn: 老邻居们都去了活力

sentences.en: The primroses should begin to seed themselves down the steep hillside.
sentences.cn: 报春花应该开始沿着陡峭的山坡一路撒播种子了。

sentences.en: The scheme offers seed corn finance with loans at only 4% interest.
sentences.cn: 该方案提供种子基金融资，其贷款只收取4%的利息。

sentences.en: The seeds of change in Eastern Europe were beginning to emerge.
sentences.cn: 东欧剧变的种子开始萌芽。

sentences.en: These plants are then pollinated and allowed to mature and produce seed.
sentences.cn: 然后，这些植物就被授粉，从而成熟结籽。

words.tran_cn: 多种子的；结籽的；破烂的
播种机；播种人；去籽机；人工造雨装置
破旧；下流；没精打采；起粒
子孙,后裔,支脉,继承人,幼兽,幼苗

phrases.phrase: go to seed 或 run to seed
phrases.tran_cn: 衰老：变得虚弱或无力；退化
葡萄籽萃取物；葡萄籽精华
种子处理；种子处理试验；拌种剂，种子处理剂
香瓜子，葵花子；向日葵籽

trans.tran_cn: 种子，子孙，起源，（尤指网球比赛）种子选手
trans.tran_en: a player or team in a competition that is given a particular position, according to how likely they are to win
to remove seeds from fruit or vegetables

trans.tran_cn: 播种，抽出种子选手，除去…之种子，确定（某人）为种子选手
